com.mooregreatsoftware.gradle.util

Class LangUtils

  • com.mooregreatsoftware.gradle.util.LangUtils

  • public class LangUtils

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends Throwable>
      java.lang.RuntimeException      		 softened()
      Remove checked-ness from the exception. The same exception is returned (checked or unchecked), but this removes the compiler's checks.
      static <T> T tryGet()
      Tries to run the given function and return its value, but will "soften" any exception that is thrown.
      static void tryRun()
      Tries to run the given function, but will "soften" any exception that is thrown.

    • Method Detail

      • softened

        public static <T extends Throwable> java.lang.RuntimeException softened()

        Remove checked-ness from the exception. The same exception is returned (checked or unchecked), but this removes the compiler's checks.

      • tryRun

        public static void tryRun()

        Tries to run the given function, but will "soften" any exception that is thrown.

        See Also:
        LangUtils.softened

      • tryGet

        public static <T> T tryGet()

        Tries to run the given function and return its value, but will "soften" any exception that is thrown.

        See Also:
